Vanillian is a speculative media conglomerate concerned with alchemy, autism, and Annie.

The webmaster is more or less a conduit for this entity. Having lived most of his life through the proxy of the Internet, Vanillian: the website is an attempt at something that reaches back. It's a proof of existence, as well as an attempt to

I also like video games.
